scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev -w server" "npm run dev -w client"
scripts.lint: npm run lint -w shared && npm run lint -w server && npm run lint -w client && npm run lint -w @psstore/sony-contract-bot
scripts.typecheck: npm run build -w shared && npm run typecheck -w server && npm run typecheck -w client && npm run typecheck -w @psstore/sony-contract-bot
scripts.test: npm run test -w shared && npm run test -w server && npm run test -w client && npm run test -w @psstore/sony-contract-bot
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w client && npm run build -w server && npm run build -w @psstore/sony-contract-bot
scripts.clean: rm -rf build client/build server/dist shared/dist tools/sony-contract-bot/dist
